title: I miss when the scoreboard used to sort itself correctly instead of always putting you on top
body:
When they made it sort correctly I said: Yes.
But when they got rid of that I said: No.

Gone are the days of easy information. Gone are the days of effortless knowledge. Back then you could just press TAB and immediately compare yourself to your lane opponent. But now, now you need to spend time rearranging, sometimes several positions if you are ADC or support. 

That is why I main top now, because the system still works perfectly if you play top. I encourage everyone to only play top and dodge if they don't get it, that way rito will know how much this means to us.
